content.rendered:
JCG’s annual business benchmarking summit is coming up, have you signed up yet? Call us today for more information at 888-250-7747 or email us at info@johnsonconsulting.com.  Here is what people had to say regarding the last summit:

Jake and Tom:

I want to say a special thanks to you both and your entire organization for another outstanding forum.  The location, the presenters and the participants were all top notch.  You do a great job in choosing your topics and finding the right professional to deliver the message in a manner which can be understood by all.  I look for the take away items that will immediate impact with our customers and with our staff who are so very important to our continued improvement and growth.

Be assured that everyone needs some facet of your organizations knowledge base.  The collateral good that I obtain from this gathering is the diverse group of participants.  It was a wonderful group and I had a great time seeing old friends and making new acquaintances.  Keep up the good work.  You can be most proud of your people.  They are the top 1%.

Kindest personal regards…

Michael Meierhoffer

Meierhoffer Funeral Home & Crematory, Saint Joseph, MO

Thank you all for a very informative and easy to understand gathering in Scottsdale.  I loved the format, especially the part when we started to share each others challenges and successes.  The venue was excellent and the company was even better.  Thanks again for a great time and looking forward to JCG’s next event.

Take Care,

Anthony Guerra

Guerra Gutierrez Mortuaries, Los Angeles, CA
